verses.name: Genesis 36:1
verses.text: Now these are the generations of Esau, who is Edom.

verses.name: Genesis 36:2
verses.text: Esau took his wives of the daughters of Canaan; Adah the daughter of Elon the Hittite, and Aholibamah the daughter of Anah the daughter of Zibeon the Hivite;

verses.name: Genesis 36:3
verses.text: And Bashemath Ishmael’s daughter, sister of Nebajoth.

verses.name: Genesis 36:4
verses.text: And Adah bare to Esau Eliphaz; and Bashemath bare Reuel;

verses.name: Genesis 36:5
verses.text: And Aholibamah bare Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah: these are the sons of Esau, which were born unto him in the land of Canaan.
